summary: DOD has faced numerous challenges ensuring that its workforce can respond to cybersecurity threats. For instance, the Navy has had issues with its workforce data. The Navy's civilian cyber workforce data are stored in two different data systems, and the data in both systems differ. This has caused, among other things, civilian workforce data to show inaccurately high vacancy rates. We've previously reported on similar...
title: Cyber Personnel: Navy Needs to Address Accuracy of Workforce Data
